text: == Events == * The city of Oslo is founded by King Harald Hardrada of Norway. * Battle of Pasinler â€“ Seljuks defeat a force of Byzantines and Georgians. * Pope Benedict IX is driven out of Rome, ending his third and final pontificate. == Births == * May 18 - Omar Khayyam, Persian poet and mathematician (died 1134) * date unknown ** Michael IX Comneus, Byzantine emperor (died 1088) ** Pope Paschal II (died 1118) == Deaths == * Pope Damasus II (born 1000)
